cliArguments.all: Tells the engine to select all options (if this is a multi selection box).

description: Provides a convenience method for manipulating selections of options in an HTML select element. This action supports different selection options as well as multiple selection based on a pattern.

examples.description: Select an option by the value.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box on {//select} from {value} {4}

examples.description: Select the option by the index, as determined by the [index] attribute of the element.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box on {//select} from {index} {1}

examples.description: Select all options by the text displayed (exact match only).
Select all options (if this is a multi selection box).
Select all options which their text can be matched with the given pattern.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {{$ --all}} on {//select} filter with {Eco} pattern.

name: SelectFromComboBox

properties.elementToActOn: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.elementAttributeToActOn: The element attribute from which to extract information for action execution. If not specified, information will be taken from the element inner text.
properties.regularExpression: A pattern by which the extracted information will be evaluated. Returns the first match.
properties.argument: The value to be used by the requested selecting attribute.

summary: Provides a convenience method for manipulating selections of options in an HTML <select> element.
